file_content.text: Help me... please... I... ugh....
What are you doing here? What happened to you?
Who are you?
I... I was... argh!
I can help you, if you allow it.
Calm yourself.
Can't... my head... argh!
I will strike you down if you take another step.
Stay back!
One more step and I'll drop you.
Stay back!
Please... I... argh!
Now, now, what are you doing out of stasis? You're not supposed to--oh. You again.
This could have been your future, you know. I tested every correction available, but my experiments only proved that your kind cannot be repaired.
Extermination is the only option.
I will tear your movement apart long before you have the chance.
You first.
Time is on my side.
You fail at a few science projects, then decide to wipe out the galaxy? Pathetic.
Quitter.
There is simply no alternative.
Maybe you aren't keeping score, but I've left a lot of scrap behind me.
Don't get your hopes up.
Of course. Your kind lives to kill, while my fellow revolutionaries exist purely for peace and reason.
I'm afraid I've seen far worse than this in my time, Mentor.
Do you mean to intimidate me?
Knowing what I do about your kind, I do not doubt it.
You will release his mind. Now.
Let this man go.
Get out of the guy's head. Now.
Let this man go.
Perhaps if I do, you'll agree with my conclusion.
I'm going to enjoy ripping you apart piece by piece.
I can't wait to kill you.
I'm sure you would like that very much. You're no different than the rest of your kind.
You are nothing more than a pack of hateful, irrational beasts. Violence and anger are all you know--observe!
Aaarrrgh!
Please... please, help me....
You're going to be alright. Don't worry.
I'm here to help.
Thank you... argh!
How did you get here? What happened?
Who are you?
I was... it... argh!
Don't come any closer, or I will defend myself.
Stay back!
Take one more step and I'll drop you.
Stay back!
No... I... argh!
Now, now, you're supposed to be resting in your stasis canister. Why are you--oh. You again.
You've found the leftovers of my original plan for your kind. I once hoped that I could actually repair your hateful nature.
Sadly, my experiments eventually confirmed that there is only one effective treatment: extermination.
I've known Sith who wouldn't commit acts like this.
You're a monster.
Don't fool yourself. Given the opportunity, any one of your kind would do far worse.
You speak of free will, then rob this man of his?
You're a hypocrite.
I attempted to save him from the foulest aspects of his nature. Regrettably, I failed.
I'm right here, Mentor. Show me what you've got.
Try me.
Pointless posturing, designed to elicit an emotional response. Don't waste your time.
You can't even take me out. What are you going to do with a whole galaxy?
Don't get ahead of yourself.
Don't worry, you'll be dealt with very soon.
Perhaps I'll let one of your own kind deal with you. Enjoy.
Release your hold on his mind! Now!
Let this man go!
You're going to get out of his head, and you're going to do it right now.
Let this man go!
As soon as I do, you'll see why I've drawn this conclusion.
We're going to be face-to-face very soon, Mentor. Enjoy the time you have left.
Just wait until I get to you.
Empty threats and fantasies of violence. You're no different than the rest of your kind.
You are nothing more than a pack of hateful, irrational beasts. Violence and anger are all you know--observe!
Aaarrrgh!
